full_summary:
**Title**
Personal Flotation Devices and Related Equipment (RFSO)

**Solicitation Reference Number**
202400321

**Publication Date**
August 17, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
September 19, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Trade Agreements**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Delivery**
Canada

**Notice Type**
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Description**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified suppliers to submit a National Individual Standing Offer for Personal Flotation Devices (PFDs). The contract duration is two (2) years, with three (3) additional one (1) year options.

**Requirements and Deliverables**
The supplier must deliver all goods within thirty (30) days of each call-up. The basis of selection is the lowest compliant bid.

**Contracting Entity**
The RCMP Standing Offer Authority is responsible for managing this procurement. Contact information is as follows:

* Name: Daniel Caughey
* Email: daniel.caughey@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 550-4936
* Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2

**Tender Documents**
The solicitation documents, including the terms and conditions, are available on the Canada Buys website at Tender opportunities | CanadaBuys.

**Important**
 Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. All bidders must comply with the integrity provisions as outlined in this solicitation.

**Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)**
The Canadian government uses GETS to publish Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents. It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to regularly consult GETS for the most up-to-date information. The government will not be liable for any oversight on the bidder's part nor for notification services offered by a third party. You can find more information about the solicitation and tender documents through the Canada Buys website.
